alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Lowlands of the Bootheel; Northern Dona Ana County; Otero Mesa; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin; Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 31 at 1:41PM MST until January 01 at 11:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Southwest and southcentral New Mexico lowlands and far west Texas. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Saturday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong westerly winds could blow around unsecured objects and remaining holiday decorations. Tree limbs could be blown down. Possible damage to weak structures.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
